scripts.clean: yarn install:clean && yarn build:clean && yarn test:clean
scripts.build: react-scripts build && cp icon.png config.xml build && tizen build-web --output ../.buildResult -- build
scripts.run:emulator: tizen package --type wgt --sign Tivi -- .buildResult/ && tizen install --name ReactTizenApp.wgt --target TV-Samsung-Emulator -- .buildResult && tizen run --pkgid Utz81nMLJp.ReactTizenApp --target TV-Samsung-Emulator
